title: Linux OS - Security Leak - Vulnerability "Being exploited in the wild"
content:
Hello

My name is Loic Coupel

I got a security issue on my personal website Wordpress "www.healthinyourplanet.com"

The problem is related to this exploit : - https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2024-9680 - https://uk.pcmag.com/browsers/154823/update-now-firefox-gets-critical-fix-after-flaw-exploited-in-the-wild

What happen is the following:

I went to my Wordpress Website I login to it (2FA authentication) Open a "Post" to edit it I wanted to change a picture So I delete the old picture and try to add new one but when the Menu open to give me access to the Picture Library Then The Cursor moved in lot of dirrection Getting unstable

Then This time with the cursor moving I got Process on Top Menu that get in high CPU Process impact in TOP : "ksoftirqd" But that's not often the case Sometimes CPU get High with other process

I have reported the issue to Wordpress, Kubio, Mageia Linux Os, Wpmudev

If you have any question please let me know

Kind Regards Loic Coupel www.healthinyourplanet.com Linux OS Mageia 9.0 Firefox : 128.3.1esr (64-bit)
creator: loic8

title: mancata richiesta autenticazione con impronta digitale
content:
Salve,

non capisco perche' in firefox non mi fa inserire la mia impronta digitale all'avvio di un sito protetto con password..con chrome questo avviene mentre con firefox pur avendo selezionato in impostazioni-privacy e sicurezza-richiedi conferma dell'accesso al dispositivo per compilare automaticamente e gestire le password. bene e' tutto attivato e confermato con la mia impronta ma poi non me la fa mettere e quindi se il pc si trovasse in mani sbagliate avendo memorizzate le password la mia privacy sarebbe in pericolo. con chrome questo non avviene per esempio, e l'autenticazione tramite impronta e' richiesta ogni volta che si entra su un sito con username e password salvate. Al momento purtroppo con firefox sono costretto a utilizzare la password principale perche della richiesta con impronta non vi e' traccia!

attendo un vostro riscontro per la risoluzione del problema.

grazie
creator: pili.fabrizio1

title: Firefox Interface
content:
Dear Firefox

I am writing to you as regards your current upgrade and its interface. The taps bar and tools bar are very wide, thus decreasing area below them. The cannot because customized with the little knowledge I have in development.

I jumped FF V90 to this current upgrade FF 131.03 because anytime I tried to upgrade, I find the Interface not to my liking due to what I have already described above. I have seen similar comments like mine on the browser comments. One user actually asked if FF interface to V 80.02 which I support for it is the best of Interfaces so far in the development of the FF browser.

I hope to hear from you soon before I take a decision to go back to FF V90.0.

P/S: My 2 email addresses: 

                                            1. DRCLEMENTAKATENG@AOL.COM                                             2. DRCLEMENTAKATENG@GMAIL.COM

Also in trying to upload Image of the browser for clarity purpose, I get this: 

                                           Error uploading Image                                            Invalid or no image received.

What is happening here about Uploaded images: Add images (optional), I cannot fathom. There is certainly a block somewhere on the Support page.

Kind regards.

DR CLEMENT AKATENG MD

title: Keyboard not working in firefox on ubuntu xorg
content:
I have a brand new setup of ubuntu 22.04.5 LTS with Mozilla Firefox 131.0.3

If I log in to the normal version of ubuntu ( Wayland display server) , all is well.

If I log in to 'ubuntu on xorg' the keyboard does not work on firefox ( If type anywhere on firefox, nothing appears) . Works everywhere else.

I have tried launching firefox in safe mode, still no keyboard function. Also, if I turn on the accessible screen keyboard, that does not work with firefox either.

Any advice appreciated

Michael
creator: mjfirbank

title: Two desktop devices are recognised as a single device in Sync
content:
Dear Support,

I am using Firefox from two Debian desktops and an Android phone. I would like to sync opened tabs, but my two desktop devices are seen one by accounts.firefox.com. It shows only a phone and a single desktop device, whose name is switching between the names of the two desktop instances, according to which one of them has synced recently. Also the Android application sees only one of the two sets of tabs (switching between them), always from the PC that was used recently. I guess the problem is that I have copied all the dotfiles at the installation of the second PC. Can you suggest a quick solution that does not involve the deletion of all mozilla related dotfiles and reinstallation of the browser?

Thank you for your help!
creator: danithered

title: ETP breaks Teachable.com courses
content: ETP breaks Teachable.com courses. Specifically because the domain player.hotmart.com is blocked. But this domain itself isn't used for tracking. Hotmart uses tracking-api.hotmart.com for tracking. So ETP breaks all websites that serve their courses via Teachable and there is no workaround other than disabling ETP for that site. Please whitelist Hotmart and add tracking domain only.

title: web page not loading properly
content: I have recently run into an issue with web page not loading correctly. over the last couple of weeks, after I sign on to my bank's web site, I get a screen with non-functioning buttons(see attached screenshot). I contacted the bank, and their instructions were to clear cookies and cache, close Firefox and re-open the browser, and this should clear up the problem; or, update the browser. my Firefox is the latest version 131.0.3. the issue still existed after performing these steps. I tried using MS Edge and all screens loaded correctly. Firefox is my browser of choice, and I have not had this issue previously. please respond with feedback, so I know how to move forward. thank you.
